EmailTemplate.description: Email notification template sent to an outlet on submission of their case by CIA Team
EmailTemplate.name: CIA - Registration Receipt
EmailTemplate.subject: New Case {!Case.CaseNumber} has been created.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Customer,
Thank you for contacting the Australia Post Lodgement and API team. We’re looking into your query and will respond to you as soon as possible.
Your case number is: {!Case.CaseNumber}
Subject: {!Case.Subject}
Want a prompt response?
To help us respond to your query as quickly and efficiently as possible, please follow these tips:
Please avoid sending a follow-up email until we have responded. Once we’ve replied, please reply to our response email for any future correspondence about that case. Please include our email address in the ‘To’ field of your email, not in the Cc or Bcc field.
Following these tips will mean we get the right information back to you more promptly.
If your matter is urgent, please call our national helpdesk at 1800 028 361 (Select Option 1) and quote the above Salesforce Case Number.
Kind regards,
The Australia Post Lodgement & API team
{!Case.Thread_Id}
